title: Navaratna Chandbali Stud Earrings - A Timeless Classic
materials: Diamond Simulants. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: Circular stud design showcasing the Navaratna (nine gemstones) concept. A lustrous pearl sits at the center, surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamond simulants. Emerald beads, natural pearls, and ruby zirconia are meticulously arranged around the center to create a vibrant and auspicious design. The earrings are crafted with fine goldwork, reflecting the rich heritage of Hyderabadi jewelry.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant green from the emeralds
and the dazzling clear sparkle of the diamond simulants. A harmonious blend of colors considered auspicious in South Indian tradition.
occasions: and other special occasions. Also suitable for gifting during Muhurtham
or Voni Function (Half-Saree Function). Can be paired with both traditional and modern outfits for an elegant touch.
description: Represents the auspicious Navaratna concept, believed to bring prosperity and good fortune. Handcrafted with intricate detail by skilled artisans, using high-quality materials. The blend of traditional design with modern sensibility makes these earrings a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures a lasting radiance. A cherished heirloom piece to be passed down through generations.
